p.k: Footage of sharks hunting tuna, revealing the tactics used to catch fish that are much larger and faster than they are and the rivals they have to outwit
Exploring the wildlife in the seas around the Socorro islands, where sharks amass in their thousands and humpback whales visit while migrating
Zeb Hogan goes in search of whale sharks, the biggest fish in the world, in Mexico's Sea of Cortez, and discovers why they are drawn to shallow water in the spring
Footage of sharks hunting tuna, revealing the tactics used to catch fish that are much larger and faster than they are and the rivals they have to outwit
The team is forced to reconsider its techniques when caught off-guard by the sheer power of three tiger sharks
Eager to learn more about sharks in the waters surrounding Socorro Island, the team sets a trap on the ocean bed
Documentary investigating mysteries found in nature, beginning with a look at why Florida's New Smyrna Beach has become the shark bite capital of the world
Scientists explore marine wildlife in the waters around the Pitcairn Islands in the Pacific Ocean
Divers embark on a mission to free sharks and turtles from illegal fishing lines off the coast of mainland Costa Rica
Documentary uncovering revelations made by marine biologists as they explore the development and behaviour of the ocean creatures
Documentary about unusual situations in which sharks have migrated in vast numbers, sometimes close to populated areas
Rare footage of sharks being attacked and eaten by other animals, revealing the circumstances in which a powerful predator can slide down the food chain
Scientists examine why the beach of Port St Johns in South Africa has been the site of 10 shark attacks in the past eight years
Leading scientists and cinematographers revisit five feeding frenzies, including footage of 200 blue sharks gorging on a seven-tonne whale
Experts investigate footage of shark attacks to understand the worldwide increase in incidents, beginning with a fisherman's fate at the jaws of a Caribbean shark
Scientists dive into a 700-strong pack of sharks as they film their annual night-time feeding frenzy in the pitch-black waters of Fakarava Atoll, Polynesia
Scientists analyse evidence of sharks attacking each other, and investigate the environmental factors that might drive the aquatic predators to turn on their own kind
Examining the reasons behind a surge in attacks at a popular holiday destination along the Carolina coast in 2015
Experts investigate the unprecedented 16 shark attacks that rocked Maui, Hawaii, between 2011 and 2013
Eager to learn more about sharks in the waters surrounding Socorro Island, the team sets a trap on the ocean bed
Documentary investigating mysteries found in nature, beginning with a look at why Florida's New Smyrna Beach has become the shark bite capital of the world
